author: Staff Reporter
text:
Second Additional District Sessions Court Judge Jeyaraj on Wednesday sentenced a murder accused to undergo life imprisonment.

According to prosecution, P. Murugaiah (44), a farmer of Ulakudi, was found guilty of murdering his wife Saravanammal (40) after both of them were engaged in a quarrel on March 21 in 2014.

Puliyampatti police filed a case. Besides, fine of Rs.1,000 was imposed on him.
title: Sentenced to life
